mapper.insert: insert into dealData (head, login, openOrderNum, newOpenOrderNum, varietyCode, counts, price, createTime, cmd, openClose, profit) values (#{head}, #{login}, #{openOrderNum}, #{newOpenOrderNum}, #{varietyCode}, #{counts}, #{price}, #{createTime}, #{cmd}, #{openClose}, #{profit})
mapper.select: select head, login, openOrderNum, newOpenOrderNum, varietyCode, counts, price, createTime, cmd, openClose, profit from dealData
